alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 8:09PM CST until January 31 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River at Edinburg. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Minor over bank flooding continues in areas south of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Monday the stage was 20.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday morning and continue falling to 16.2 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 20.8 Mon 6 pm CST 20.3 19.4 18.4 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 1000 AM CST.
